5886.verse: وَأَذِنَتْ|And has listened|129|210|17976$لِرَبِّهَا|to its Lord|88|250|17977$وَحُقَّتْ|and was obligated,|145|226|17978$

5891.verse: فَأَمَّا|Then as for|96|123|265$مَنْ|(him) who|86|140|76$أُوتِىَ|is given|70|124|1237$كِتَـٰبَهُۥ|his record|85|139|10466$بِيَمِينِهِۦ|in his right hand,|131|158|10467$

5884.verse: Have the disbelievers [not] been rewarded [this Day] for what they used to do?

5886.verse: And has responded to its Lord and was obligated [to do so]

5887.verse: And when the earth has been extended

5888.verse: And has cast out that within it and relinquished [it]

5889.verse: And has responded to its Lord and was obligated [to do so] -

5890.verse: O mankind, indeed you are laboring toward your Lord with [great] exertion and will meet it.

5891.verse: Then as for he who is given his record in his right hand,

5892.verse: He will be judged with an easy account

5893.verse: And return to his people in happiness.

5894.verse: But as for he who is given his record behind his back,

5895.verse: He will cry out for destruction

5896.verse: And [enter to] burn in a Blaze.

5897.verse: Indeed, he had [once] been among his people in happiness;

5898.verse: Indeed, he had thought he would never return [to Allah].

5899.verse: But yes! Indeed, his Lord was ever of him, Seeing.

5900.verse: So I swear by the twilight glow

5901.verse: And [by] the night and what it envelops

5902.verse: And [by] the moon when it becomes full

5903.verse: [That] you will surely experience state after state.

5904.verse: So what is [the matter] with them [that] they do not believe,

5905.verse: And when the Qur'an is recited to them, they do not prostrate [to Allah]?

5906.verse: But those who have disbelieved deny,

5907.verse: And Allah is most knowing of what they keep within themselves.

5908.verse: So give them tidings of a painful punishment,

5909.verse: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds. For them is a reward uninterrupted.
